metadata.synopsis: Player steals the parchment in the Archive in HoH
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. WYR, Sharess Caress, RAphael's room2. Make deal with Raphael3. Teleport to LOW, HoH4. Teleport to Incubus, kill him, loot his key5. Open big painting on the wall behind him. Loot and read note.6. Teleport to Archivist.7. Click on big barrel with contract. Choose the password you read on the note.8. Take contract. Interact with it in inventory

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *This piece of humble parchment contains your promise to give Raphael the Crown of Karsus. Without it, you are unbound from him forever.*
2.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player rips the contract (off screen) - shoot around and achieve this with sound, then looks up, as though surprised/ worried.

[SCENE]  REUSE RS: SCENE_GLO_Book_Lockpick_Fail_PLYR (cut in close to hide hands, trim anim and use on hard cut - talk to Ellen if needed)
